SongLyrics.JpnStr: 出来[でき]れば世界[せかい]を僕[ぼく]は塗[ぬ]り変[か]えたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: If possible, I want to change the world

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 戦争[せんそう]をなくすような大[だい]逸[いつ]それたことじゃない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Not something extraordinary like ending wars

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だけど一寸[ちょっと] それもあるよな
SongLyrics.EngStr: But well, maybe a bit of that too

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 俳優[はいゆう]や映画[えいが]スターには成[な]れない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can't become an actor or a movie star

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それ処[どころ]か 君[きみ]の前[まえ]でさえも上手[じょうず]に笑[わら]えない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Moreover, I can't even smile well in front of you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんな僕[ぼく]に術[すべ]はないよな
SongLyrics.EngStr: There's no way for me like that

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 嗚呼[ああ]…
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ah...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なに]を間違[まちが]った?
SongLyrics.EngStr: What did I do wrong?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それさえも分[わ]からないんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't even know that

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ローリング ローリング
SongLyrics.EngStr: Rolling, rolling

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 初[はじ]めから持[も]ってないのに胸[むね]が痛[いた]んだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even though I never had it from the beginning, my chest hurts

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らはきっとこの先[さき]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: Surely, from now on, we

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 心[こころ]絡[から]まって ローリング ローリング
SongLyrics.EngStr: Entwining hearts, rolling, rolling

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 凍[い]てつく地面[じめん]を転[ころが]る様[よう]に走[はし]り出[だ]した
SongLyrics.EngStr: Started running as if rolling on the frozen ground

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 理由[わけ]もないのに何[なん]だか悲[かな]しい
SongLyrics.EngStr: For no reason, it feels somewhat sad

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 泣[な]けやしないから 余計[よけい]に救[すく]いがない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can't cry, so there's even less salvation

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんな夜[よる]を温[あたた]める様[よう]に歌[うた]うんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I sing to warm up such nights

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 岩[いわ]は転[ころ]がって 僕[ぼく]たちを何処[どこ]かに連[つ]れて行[い]く様[よう]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: The rocks roll, leading us somewhere

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 固[かた]い地面[じめん]を分[わ]けて命[いのち]が芽生[めばえ]ればえた
SongLyrics.EngStr: Life sprouts, dividing the solid ground

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あの丘[おか]を越[こ]えたその先[さき]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: Beyond that hill

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 光[ひかり]輝[かがや]いた様[よう]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: Shines brilliantly

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の孤独[こどく]も全[すべ]て暴[あば]き出[だ]す朝[あさ]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's a morning that exposes all of your loneliness

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 赤[あか]い小[ちいさな]車[くるま]は君[きみ]を乗[の]せて
SongLyrics.EngStr: A small red car, with you inside

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 遠[とお]く向[むこう]の角[かど]を曲[まが]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: Turns around the distant corner

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 此処[ここ]からは見[み]えなくなった
SongLyrics.EngStr: From here, it can't be seen anymore

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なに]をなくした?
SongLyrics.EngStr: What did I lose?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それさえも分[わ]からないんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't even know that

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ローリング ローリング
SongLyrics.EngStr: Rolling, rolling

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 初[はじ]めから持[も]ってないのに胸[むね]が痛[いた]んだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even though I never had it from the beginning, my chest hurts

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らはきっとこの先[さき]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: Surely, from now on, we

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 心[こころ]絡[から]まって ローリング ローリング
SongLyrics.EngStr: Entwining hearts, rolling, rolling

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 凍[い]てつく世界[せかい]を転[ころが]る様[よう]に走[はし]り出[だ]した
SongLyrics.EngStr: Started running as if rolling on the frozen world

ListVocab: それさえも-それさえも
それ処か-それどころか
ローリング-ろーりんぐ
塗り変えたい-ぬりかえたい
持ってない-もってない
連れて行く-つれていく
